name: George Chasiotis
description: George Chasiotis is the Managing Director of Minuttia, an adaptive content marketing agency that drives growth, without the guesswork and without excuses. He’s also the Founder of GrowthWaves, a newsletter that helps you get smarter about growth. George started as an independent marketing consultant but was soon pulled down the path of creating an agency. In his free time, he imparts wisdom (read: rants) on LinkedIn or buries his head in psychology books to get down the “why” of human behavior.
